data.text: Jihudi ngai Dan kha chu akatha phur lakajuosik raliim kha eii halli ka-etak phur ngaikha emak. Khawa jarra kumsuo ah inmani'n inchatlekleiya inpeii dooiphur ngaikhan heikaluut mi ngaikha angtikniteii pui mintungmak.
Pathian chubeikatho mi ngaikha inmanuwa inphut inthiangtak in e-inchu, manu jarra kahoimak woikhat inlet-ah inmani diang suok khainuni jei, halli dooiphur rakip ngaikha inleidasik ejei.
Takkha kum rakip-ah dooiphur inpekhan mi ngaikha inmanu ngaikha inminngaidon.
Ajarchu saraatchal li keel ngai thisen khan manu ngaikha angtikniteii khaimatormak.
Hiwa jarra, Christa khan manmasituolla ajuo siktiang, ama'n Pathian diang ati:
Nang in maichaam chungnga sangai inroumang
kei'n kaleiti, ‘Kei hin kaom,

Ama'n ma-insa ah aleiti, “Nang in kutchoi khat-um dooiphur ngai emakli manu ngai minmangna sik-ah sangai maichaam chungnga inroumang hi manuommakche khat-um namalung taimak.” Ama'n hiwahi aleiti Dan dungjuiya hiwa dooiphur rakip inpe innum.
Hiwasuoli ama'n aleiti, “E Pathian, nalungdou katho sik-ah kei hin kaom.” Khawajarra Pathian in dooiphur maruo ngaikha aminmangjei halli Christa inphalpina kha aminthuulpijei.
Pathian minthozoot kha Jisu Christa in athojei jarra, eini rakip sik-ah ama'n apumtak kha apha rakipsik woikhat bit inpesuokna khan manu makheiya anaminthiangjei.
Jihudi ngai thiampu rakip in ama chuon ngaikha nisuo-ah intho halli dooiphur in-angrip kha innolla inpeii; takkha hiwa dooiphur pena ngaikhan manu ngaikha angtikniteii leiminmang matormak. Suok 29:38
Christa in, manu ngai sik-ah woikhat inphalna khan kumsoot sik-ah na-inphalpi ejei, halli ama'n Pathian changtiang khan in-ongjei.
Ama inhalpui ngaikha Pathian in ama ketouna ah adamak laiseng tuun ama khawakhan ngaak ah aom. Minpkla 110:1
Woikhatbit inphalna khan, manuwa inphut iminthiang ngaikha kumsoot sik-ah puikatung ejei.
Halli Ratha Inthiang innum einidiang ama sakhi napejei. Mansakhet-ah ama'n ati,
“Hiwahi inmanile inruoiya kei'n kaboolsik inzootna kha eii
Halli ama'n ati, “Kei'n inmani manu ngai khat-um inchuontho kathamak ngaikha ngaidon khainuningjei.” Jer 31:34
Khawajarra hiwa manu ngai inngaidampha, manu ngai kaminmangsik dooiphur inkhat kha arei ommakjei.
Khawajarra, ulenai ngai, Jisu thisen khan Inthiang khet Munna kasi sik-ah inngamna kha nineijei.
Maiduongpuon tinachu ama apumtak khan ringna lam, kathar lam einisik ama'n namalongpijei.
Eini thiampu kaliankhet Pathian innsuung karoon inkhat kha ninei.

Khawajarra kase katha jetna malung inthiangmak ah inphut malung inthiangle taksa ngaihi tui inthiang khan rasuthiang inlang kangamnatak le malung inthiang khan Pathian diang eini'n nairui. Levi 8:30; Ezek 36:25
Eini'n nirilsuok ni-inngamna kha kacheet-ah mahuumrui, ajarchu ama chong-inkhitna kha nida theinasik eini'n Pathian kha ni-ngamna.
Eini inkhat li inkhat inngaidon inlang inkhat li inkhat inriang malar nasik insanrui halli akatha kha thorui.
Mi lekkhat in intho angnga, ni-intuup jolhi eini damui, Pumi juonasik Nikhuo ajuonaijei ti ningjet angnga, kheella khat li khat eini malung insokrui.
Ajarchu einidiang akatuun kha naminjet suonuk, nijet pumma eini'n manu nilatho inchu, manu minmang nasik-ah na-inphalpi woikhat omnunijei.
Khawa rathuulla, kachi le inruoiya ngaaksik lakaom rakip khachu meikakaang in Pathian inhalpui ngai minmang nasik khat-um alakajuosik chongtanna khabit ejei. Isa 26:11
Tu e-innum Moses Dan kajuimak ama kha chong-intan pha, inni emakli inthum sakhiya inphut amasialna inmu inchu, minriang omleiya inthatsik eii. Innidan 17:6; 19:15

Khawakha e-inchu, Pathian Sapa innuipui ngai, Inmani manuwa inphut kaminthiang inzootna Pathian thisen kha aman kaommak angnga kalei ngai, riangwai Ratha kha innuipui ngai, Inmani sik-ah rahoikasuok rachaakna kha angtuk kathamak sikme? ngaidonru! Suok 24:8
Ajarchu ama'n iti kha eini'n nijet, “Kei'n phaphu kaluoksik eii, kei'n kapekirsik eii”; halli ama innum inlet-ah ati, “Pumi'n ami ngaikha chong tansik eii.” Innidan 32:35; Innidan 32:36
Akaring Pathian kut chungnga kachulsik hi chikaomtak inkhat kha eii!

Matiang khan angtho-thoa hiwahi nangnidiang aleisuokme ngaidonru. Khawa nikhuo ngaikhan, Pathian war kha ningchungnga aminwar suonuk, nangni'n angjet ningleipoong, kha e-innum khawa poongna khan naleimatormak.
Aphakhat khan nangni mipui karra inna-innuipui khat-um kase-ah innaleitho, halli aleiilak pha khat-ah hiwale in-angrip ah leiilak mi ngai'n poongraalna inneipha kadeipui sik-ah ning inchelpui ejei.
Nangni'n kheella akatha kumsoot kasisik angmekhat ningnei kha ningjet jarra, ningnei rakip kha innakasut innum karok-ah ningdeimator, halli mikhumna-ah kaom ngai poongna khannum ningdeipui.
Nangni ngamna kha minmang maru, ajarchu khawakhan thoman kalokkhet kha aheichoisik eii.
Pathian lungdou kha thona sik-ah khat-um angme ama chong-inkhitna kha ralaangnasik ah nangni kadeikaraat sik hi arei ejei.
Ajarchu, chong-inthiang iti angnga,
Kha e-innum kami kadik ngaikhan, inngamna inta halli inringsik eii;
Eini chu nuktiang kirra inmang mi ngaikha emakmi. Khawa rathuulla, eini ngamna kanei khat-um karing ngaikha ni-ejei.
